alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 12:03PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington, Hyde, west central Dare, east central Beaufort and southern Tyrrell Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1202 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Killkenny, or 29 miles west of Stumpy Point, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Killkenny, Scranton, Ponzer, Fairfield, Leechville, Rose Bay, Fort Landing, Buffalo City, Lake Mattamuskeet, and Alligator Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington
